text:
🐦‍⬛Drongo Trail is an elevated boardwalk running parallel to the Venus Link.
🐦‍⬛At an elevated level, the Drongo Boardwalk offers a sub canopy perspective to the surrounding lush vegetation, especially of the understory.
🦛Was luck enough to saw 2 wild boars foraging among the vegetations during the hike. But didn't saw any Drongo, unfortunately.
🐦‍⬛Drongo Boardwalk exit to connect up with Venus Link and MacRitchie Nature Trail.
While the trail and nature is quite nice, you are quite near a road and some construction works so you hear a lot of noise that ruins the experience
